title: One giant leap
creator_credit: Educational Media, Special Films Group, Associated British-Pathe and Richard Dunn
brief_description: Excellent historical footage is used in this film to trace the development of the rocket up to the first landing of man on the moon. The programs of the United States and Russia are shown, and a relatively unbiased account of successes and failures from Sputnik to Apollo is given.
